\[\begin{aligned} %!!15 D_{KL}(P||Q) = E_{X \sim P}\left[log{P(x) \over Q(x)}\right] &= E_{X \sim P}\left[log{P(x)}\right] + E_{X \sim P}\left[-log{Q(x)}\right] \\[2em] &= -H(P) + H(P, Q) \end{aligned}\]
